fields.label: About Leadership Team Image
fields.name: about_leadership_team_image
fields.instructions: Use a image that has space between the person and the edge of the image. It is also better to use a square or profile layout as the image will be cropped and displayed in a circle shape.

sub_fields.label: Wistia Video Iframe Url
sub_fields.name: wistia_video_iframe_url
sub_fields.instructions: Add the full url for the Wistia Iframe. Add the section after src= in the iframe.
